WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Animals
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: SafeHunting / Grass / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / RawTasty / InsectCorpse / Corpse / MealFine / MealLavish / RiskyHunting

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: No hunt
WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.diet: Grass / HumanlikeCorpse / Hay / Kibble = MealAwful / MealSimple / RawHuman / RawInsect / RawBad / InsectCorpse / Corpse / RawTasty / MealFine / MealLavish

WM.SmarterFoodSelection.Policy.label: Hunt-Grass-Hay-Kibble-Humans
